feed.title: Darkh Saber's blog
feed.subtitle: Stories from the Darkh Side of the web

entry.title: Let's Start the Show
entry.content:
I finally got enough I had some kind of “blogengine/design paralysis”, couldn’t decide which engine, framework and design to use, and most importantly on what topics I should focus. Enough is enough, I’m just going to start, and we’ll see what happens. The most important thing is that it should feel organic, which I believe should produce the most interesting content.

This first blog post is basically just a test to see whether everything is in place. So nothing special in here, yet.
